greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A symmetric square array of numbers, read by antidiagonals.
formula: Square array defined by T(n, k)=(k^2*n^2 + 3*k*n + 1).
xref: Rows include A028387, A082108, A069131. Main diagonal is A057721. Other diagonals include A072025. Diagonal sums (row sums if viewed as number triangle) are A082047.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 03 2003
